string.value: Since this is your first assignment as an informant, you are eager to find out whether #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has solved the mystery behind the #t4032315#. Go visit #b#p1012111##k and find out.

#p1012111# says he discovered a faint noise coming out of the #t4032315#, which only #o1210102#s can hear, and that's what's been causing their aggressive behavior. In other words, #bthe #r#o1210102#s' behavior is all because of a puppet#k! Now that you have this case pretty much wrapped up, your should report the info to #b#p1002104##k.

You notified #p1002104# about the cause of the strange behavior among the #o1210102#s, which officially concluded your first ever assignment as an informant. You should probably spend some time leveling up and training yourself now.

Oh, you're back. I noticed that it took you longer than expected to gather up the information on the changes in #o1210102#s around #m100000000#. So what was it?\n#b#L0#(You explain to him what happened in #m100000000# and some details on #t4032315#.)#l\n#k

Hmmmâ€¦ I sent you out there, thinking this would be a simple open and shut case, but now I realize that this is a very complex case. Seems like you were able to get the job done, though! I was worried about you, but you're doing quite well here.
Thanks to you, I have another piece of valuable information. I should definitely get a good price for this.

The next assignment? Well there's really not much to do right now. I suggest you keep training. Just explore the island, gain some experience, and... I'll let you know when I find a new gig. Maybe when you get to Lv. 18.

Thanks to you, I was able to understand why the #o1210102# near #m100000000# have been acting strange lately. By the way, why were you investigating this in the first place? Did #bsomebody#k ask you to do it?
